name: test_e2e_with_logs[038_SQLI_BYPASS_009]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_009` |
| **Name** | Tab and form feed bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
